text: The Rains Came is a 1939 American romantic adventure drama movie directed by Clarence Brown and is based on the novel of the same name by Louis Bromfield. It stars Myrna Low, Tyrone Power, Nigel Bruce, George Brent, Brenda Joyce, Mary Nash, Jane Darwell and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. It was nominated for 6 Oscars and won Academy Award in 1940 and was remade in 1955 under the title The Rains of Ranchipur. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1939 romantic drama movies Category:1939 adventure movies Category:American adventure movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Movies directed by Clarence Brown Category:Movies based on books Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies set in India
title: The Rains Came
